data.name: Release v1.0.2
data.body:
* 修复了一些错误及异常   —fix:修复首次创建备份时，备份文件不能添加到备份条目中, fixed #32   -fix:未创建备份就点了恢复，可能会有异常，弹窗增加了一些提示信息,     close #29, close #30 (01e436e)
* ui: 更新弹窗展示信息 (b7ac990)
* refactor: 过滤不需要的代码 (40b385e)
* build: 不需要 release it 配置文件，集成到scaffold中. 更新scaffold配置文件 (8ad5c95)

data.name: Release Manifest
data.body:
This release is used to host `update.json`, please do not delete or modify it! 
 Updated in UTC 2024-10-08T06:34:57.206Z for version 1.0.6

data.name: Release 1.0.0-9
data.body: 修复最新版本 Zotero 7 的兼容问题

data.name: Release 1.0.0-8
data.body:
* remove `npm run lint` before creating a release (5036775)
* update update-beta.json (3d19389)
* update git ignore (d4b0928)
* fix: fix errors when copy folder `IOUtils.copy` (6d85554)
* fix: Use IOUtils instead of Zotero.File and OS.File (66e55ad)
* fix: update html data (6ff640b)
* Update update-beta.json (b6b7d59)
fix some url error in plugin windows

data.name: Release 1.0.0-6
data.body: * fix: set temporary folder mode from 666 to 777 (10895cc)

data.name: Release 1.0.0-5
data.body:
* doc: update document (b81cc30)
* fix: update code for copy directory, fix error when copy subfolder in win10 (3b3726d)
* fix: preferences saving error (d5ca0ec)
* fix: update codes (c949a6b)
* fix: new function to zip folder, copy folder, remove folder and something elses. (8d0fbae)
* doc: Update plugin description (4331799)
* test: update test code (4185285)
* Merge branch 'z7' of github.com:l0o0/tara into z7 (9172ef6)
* test: update test code for zip directory (28bff9a)
* fix: 修复Windows系统下文件复制的权限问题, 更新部分UI (d95dba6)
* 添加测试代码 (58a630a)
* Merge branch 'z7' of github.com:l0o0/tara into z7 (4d09b6e)
* Update issue templates: add addon version (157ecfc)
* Update issue templates-bug report (82a4af8)
* doc: Update readme icon (9725049)
* fix: 修复部分设置不能备份的异常 (242ad02)
* test: 添加解压测试脚本 (283be51)
* fix: 修复部分设置不能备份的异常 (d487ea2)
* add: 更新配置读取及保存函数, 仅保存备份用户修改过的配置 closed #15 (17119a9)

data.name: Release 0.0.6
data.body: * ui: 完成时窗口文字，窗口大小微调,修复前一版本窗口异常大的问题 (c465a9e)

data.name: Release 0.0.4
data.body:
* ui: 对弹出窗口大小做了调整，适应不同操作系统 (1c7eac3)
* fix: 修复windows的备份文件在Mac/Linux上的恢复异常问题 closed #14, closed #10 (06d8be2)
* fix: 修复插件文件路径名异常 (3b91fd0)
* Merge pull request #16 from wddxg/master (edc2558)
* typo fix (a85443e)
* typo fix (214bd50)
* add: add new function: Import backup from local file. closed #8 (3a6fbf1)
* fix: fix spell error cancle -> cancel close #7. add new function menu (d936695)
* fix: Remove toolbar when disable/remove plugin (eeccd9f)

data.name: Release 1.0.0-3
data.body: * fix: fix typo: Cancle -> Cancel, update code style (c24f166)

data.name: Release 1.0.0-2
data.body:
* refactor: update code style by linter (2e41c71)
* fix: set default Zotero version to 6 for old backup file (9fbafcd)
* test: update code snippet (566209e)
* fix: update code for installing addons (b8ee081)
* fix: remove old tara install file when export to folder; set progress window heigth to 310 and adjust font size in #msg box (b738f00)
* fix: fix error when moving locate folder; fix error when restore addons; update progress window ui (9ad4444)
* test: add test code for development (6429e1b)
* fix: fix error when filtering preference (2d18e66)
* fix: set default export folder when it is undefined (d12be26)
* fix error when import from file (104d184)
* use filepicker to select backup zip file (f65d5d1)
* update functions and ui (dd83ee0)
* update function and ui (4896497)
* update functions (4c2b48e)
* update basic functions (4ac98c0)
* add progress window (2d538a0)
* add functions (4f6ff66)
* add: add functions (2da16e0)
* ui: init preference page (e8ae510)
* 添加功能菜单信息 (7c7f356)
* first commit (fc463fc)

data.name: Release 0.0.3
data.body: * fix: Fix undefined Zotero error when restore (b110c9e)

data.name: Version 0.0.2
data.body:
Version 0.0.2

Fix Error: Create duplicate item when Tara_backup item exists.

data.name: Release 0.0.1
data.body:
* add: add datetime string in export filename (49528ab)
* build: remove unknow targetApplication in rdf (48b238d)
* fix: fix error when install addon from file (9923f0c)
* ui: update progress display (90b4966)
* fix: add exportDir preference (68f51e6)
* ui: update displayed documents; add: merge engines.json when restore backup. (ad5c53b)
* add: add Preferences window (2ae2ba7)
* add: Update restore function and backup selection UI (ba1cdb8)
* add: restore function (a368643)
* add: complete select backup attachment in select window (12aaf62)
* ui: add select window template (a538964)
* fix: fix error when backup item is invalid (ee4fb00)
* ui: complete progress in creating and exporting backup file. (df00006)
* ui: activate progress bar (7ff24d9)
* ui: update progress window after backup file is created (34a1615)
* ui: update progress window when backup (36949ff)
* ui: progress template test (a50b738)
* add: add a simple progress template (2bf0ccd)
* add: add ISO time string to backup attachemnt tile (e767d12)
* doc: update metadata for package (d4e1344)
* ui: update icon (a4f3c7c)
* ui: add locale for zh-CN, en-US (b26c334)
* add: set default preference (79a3977)
* add: remove old backup data when create new backup data in temporary folder. Bind action to toolbar menuitem (edc9c14)
* add: update function createBackupZIP, keep zip file in tmp folder of Backup folder. Add function to import zip file as attachment (ca95059)
* ui: add menuitem on Zotero toolbar (11c7212)
* ui: add icon in zotero toolbar (9322f79)
* ui: add icon build: update github repo and creator info (4955141)
* fix: fix error on Zotero api. add: backup locate folder (7addbe0)
* add: keep backup preferences, CSL, addons, translators in a zip file (be275df)
* add: add function to backup CSL style and translators data (d269663)
* doc: update readme for test (7c3895a)
* add: 添加插件与设置信息 (61ae7de)
* build: init source code (a6a9d7d)
* first commit (74af225)
